verses.verse: And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and fetched <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> in the <S%H1389>hill<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3117>pass<s%>, from the day that the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%>, that the <S%H3117>time<s%> was <S%H7235>long<s%>; for it was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5091>lamented<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If ye do <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, then put <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and the <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3559>you<s%>, and direct your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him <S%H5337>only<s%>; and he will deliver you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.
Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did put <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> and the <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> Jehovah <S%H3068>only<s%>.
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6908>Gather<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>, and I will <S%H6419>pray<s%> for you unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And they gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, and poured it <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2398>there<s%>, We have sinned against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>.

And when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>, the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3372>it<s%>, they were afraid <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, <S%H2790>Cease<s%> not to <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H3467>us<s%>, that he will save us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2461>sucking<s%> <S%H2924>lamb<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> it for a <S%H3632>whole<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> answered <S%H6030>him<s%>.

And as <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was offering <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7481>thundered<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> upon the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> <S%H5062>them<s%>; and they were smitten down <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H1033>them<s%>, until they came under Beth-car.

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> it between <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> and <S%H8129>Shen<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H72>Eben-ezer<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Hitherto hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> helped <S%H5826>us<s%>.

So the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H3665>subdued<s%>, and they <S%H935>came<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%> within the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>.

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7725>restored<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, from <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> even unto <S%H1661>Gath<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof did <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>. And there was <S%H7965>peace<s%> between <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

And he <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1767>from<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%> in <S%H5437>circuit<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> and <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>; and he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in all those <S%H4725>places<s%>.

And his <S%H8666>return<s%> was to <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, for there was his <S%H1004>house<s%>; and there he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and he <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
